(GSET_ID = 97) to be DEBC_DEBH > 2

where CADB rows are written for other deduction

notes with INVO_DEBH_NO > GSET_QUANTITY (97); Changed selection of INVO

fetch the last CLAC row

and "Block invoices because of other old invoices"

08.12.2005 SH SCR9727 BCM431/BCM432E --> REPA is stored now, only if a T432 row
is left and also BXA432 is started then
-- BCM431A / B variables
-- Global variables
-- Convert parameter to correct picture
-- Parameters are mandatory, if not exists turn job to msgw
-- A client was detected for further handling, else BCM431 has to be closed
-- BCM431A --> Recalculate overdue above 90 days (module uses a seperate
transaction levels)
-- BCM431B - BCM431F (modules performed in one transaction)
... get markcode for WKA handling

Comment.val: IBCM431A is performed in one seperate transaction

Text.val: -- Since DCMC_SPECIALACCOUNTC can change after the call of
GB101, the DCMC test has to be done in a seperate task,
because the actual value from DB has to be used for the test
... book credit note entirely
.. book part of the credit note
-- Reset variables

SQL_STMT_U.val: select cast(sum(INVO_AACTUALC) as decimal(13,2)) from :1/INVO where INVO_DEBC_NO = :2 and ((INVO_AACTUALI >0 and days(':4') - days(INVO_DUEDATE) > :3) or INVO_AACTUALI <0) for fetch only

select INVO_DEBC_NO from :1/INVO, :1/DEBC where INVO_ADMNO = :2 and INVO_CLNTNO = :3 and INVO_AACTUALI < 0 and INVO_DEBC_NO = DEBC_NO and DEBC_LEGALCOLLECTION = 'N' group by INVO_DEBC_NO order by INVO_DEBC_NO for fetch only

Comment.val: IBCM431B - BCM431E are performed in one seperate transaction

Text.val: -- end
-- Start BXA431
-- Start BXA432
-- Final updates
-- Delete any existing CLIENT_ADJUSTEMNT_DEBTOR rows for current
detected CLALC row
-- Select debtors to store CLIENT_ADJUSTEMNT_DEBTOR rows

SQL_STMT_U.val: SELECT A.DEBB_DEBC_NO, A.DEBB_ACTINVAH, A.DEBB_ACTINVAC, A.DEBB_ADMNO, A.DEBB_CLNTNO, B.DEBC_DEBC, B.DEBC_CREDITLIMIT,B.DEBC_CLCURR, B.DEBC_FINANCELIMIT, B.DEBC_FINANCELIMITCURR, C.DEBH_HADR_NAME1 FROM (:1/DEBB A INNER JOIN :1/DEBC B ON A.DEBB_DEBC_NO =B.DEBC_NO INNER JOIN :1/DEBH C ON B.DEBC_DEBH =C.DEBH_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN :1/CMON D ON D.CMON_ADMNO = A.DEBB_ADMNO AND D.CMON_CLNTNO = A.DEBB_CLNTNO AND D.CMON_YEAR = :2 AND D.CMON_MONTH = :3 AND D.CMON_CURRENCY = ':4') WHERE (B.DEBC_DEBH <> :5 and (A.DEBB_ACTINVAH>:8 or A.DEBB_ACTINVAH>D.CMON_CURRBALDEBTORS*:9/100)) AND (A.DEBB_ADMNO = :6 AND A.DEBB_CLNTNO = :7) FOR FETCH ONLY OPTIMIZE FOR 100 ROWS

Text.val: -- uses different storage type for DEBB_ACTINVAH, not packed decimal, numeric 13
has to be used because of field definition in DB on i5
-- get previous CADB_LINENO
.. CADB_BALANCEOVERDUE407DAYS

SQL_STMT_U.val: select cast(sum(INVO_AACTUALC) as decimal(13,2)) from :1/INVO where INVO_DEBC_NO = :2 and INVO_AACTUALI >0 and INVO_DUEDATE < ':3' for fetch only
select cast(sum(INVO_AACTUALC) as decimal(13,2)) from :1/INVO where INVO_DEBC_NO = :2 and INVO_AACTUALI < 0 for fetch only

Text.val: -- get previous CADB_LINENO
-- Check if data exists for BXA431 report, if not further steps have to be
skipped
-- Perform preparations for BXA431 where a total list is created
-- Same selection as used in task "Select DEBB/DEBC" where the data (TX431)
is stored for BXA431
So if the selection has to be changed, it has to done in both tasks
-- Calculate values for T431

SQL_STMT_U.val: select cast(sum(INVO_AACTUALC) as decimal(13,2)) from :1/INVO where INVO_DEBC_NO = :2 and INVO_AACTUALI >0 and INVO_DUEDATE < ':3' for fetch only
select cast(sum(INVO_AACTUALC) as decimal(13,2)) from :1/INVO where INVO_DEBC_NO = :2 and INVO_AACTUALI >0 and INVO_DUEDATE < ':4' and INVO_DUEDATE >= ':3' for fetch only
select cast(sum(INVO_AACTUALC) as decimal(13,2)) from :1/INVO where INVO_DEBC_NO = :2 and INVO_AACTUALI < 0 for fetch only

Text.val: .. T431_CREDITLIMIT
.. T431_FINANCELIMIT
.. T431_REFERENCELIMIT
.. T431_SIZEINDICATION
.. increase v.T431_LINENO
-- Perform preparations for BXA432 where a total list is created
-- Selection of new invoices
-- Selection of paid invoices
-- Keep only debtors with new invoices and paid invoices
-- Only if T432 rows are left, store REPA and call BXA432
.. increase v.T432_LINENO
-- Write second T432 row in case of partial payment
.. increase v.T432_LINENO
-- First T432 has to be stored
... in case of partial payments
-- Second T432 has to be only stored in case of partial payments
-- Delete T432 rows for debtor clients, if not new and paid invoices eists
-- new invoices exists for debtor client
-- paid invoices exists for debtor client
Create ICA document
Set office code
-- Inform control department
-- Inform teamleader
-- Inform about large negative adjustments
-- Update Liquidation ratio
... for client currency
... for administration currency
-- For client currency
-- for heller currency
-- For both currencies (same updates)
